text: Arab-Berber ( al-Ê¿arab wa-l-barbar) is an ethnolinguistic group of the Maghreb, a large region of North Africa along the Mediterranean Sea. Arab- Berbers are people of mixed Arab and Berber origin, many speak a variant of Maghrebi Arabic as their native language, ==References== Category:Berber people Category:Arab people
title: Arab-Berber
